004package mkt;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import kut.*;
008
009/** Read volume average (in €) of serveral companies. */
010public class Volumes {
011  /**
012  Read volume average (in €) of serveral companies.
013  @param dpath   Directory with files 'NICK'.tb.
014  @param samples Number of samples to make the average.
015  @param cos     Nicks of companies to read.
016  @return Returns one value for each company. If data can not be read, the company
017          value is set to 0.
018  */
019  public static ArrayList<Double> read (
020    String dpath, int samples, String[] cos
021  ) {
022    ArrayList<Double> vols = new ArrayList<>();
023
024    for (String c : cos) {
025      try {
026        String fpath = Path.cat(dpath, c + ".tb");
027        String qsStr = File.read(fpath).trim();
028
029        int nsamples = 0;
030        double sum = 0;
031        for (String l : Str.split(qsStr, "\n")) {
032          ArrayList<String>ps = Str.split(l, ":");
033          double mx = Mth.stod(ps.get(3)).getValue();
034          double mn = Mth.stod(ps.get(4)).getValue();
035          double v = Mth.stod(ps.get(5)).getValue();
036          if (mx <= 0 || mn <= 0 || v < 0) continue;
037          v = (mx + mn) * v;
038
039          sum += v;
040          ++nsamples;
041          if (nsamples >= samples) break;
042        }
043
044        vols.add(sum / (((double)samples) * 2.0));
045      } catch (Exception e) {
046      }
047    }
048    return vols;
049  }
050}
